column4: Traffic;Kampong Thom:------ According to a report
column7: a Cambodian beer truck moving from Phnom Penh to the Kompong Thom roundabout shed it’s precious cargo.------Cases and cans of amber nectar spilled all over National Road No 6 in Stung Sen Town
column8: Kampong Thom Province but there were no casualties. Just damages to some beer. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/413847
